meanings.definition: The arrival of a notable person, thing, or event.
meanings.sent1: The advent of the new superhero brought excitement to the city.
meanings.sent2: We eagerly awaited the advent of the circus in town.
meanings.sent3: The advent of the talking dog at the party surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her advent into the world of fashion was like a burst of color in a dull room.
meanings.sent5: The advent of the comet was a sight to behold in the night sky.

meanings.definition: The first season of the Christian church year, leading up to Christmas.
meanings.sent1: During the advent, we prepare for the celebration of Christmas.
meanings.sent2: The advent season is a time of reflection and anticipation.
meanings.sent3: Santa's elves were busy getting ready for the advent festivities.
meanings.sent4: The advent period is a time of hope and joy for many people.
meanings.sent5: The advent wreath symbolizes the countdown to Christmas.
